name: web_project_4
description: > **In *Project #4-7* using HTML (flex, grid, bem), CSS, JS was created:** >* Six cards with native javascript; >* Popup window for adding new cards to page; >* Popup viewer for viewing fullsize images; >* Implemented deleting cards on pushing bin icon; >* Added function that change state of like icon. >* Added function that validate forms... >* Added classes for Card and FormValidate >* Created separate files for js modules.
